com.safenetinc.luna.provider.param
Class LunaECIESParameterSpec

java.lang.Object
  com.safenetinc.luna.provider.param.LunaECIESParameterSpec
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlgorithmParameterSpec
public class LunaECIESParameterSpec
extends Object
implements AlgorithmParameterSpec

Specifies the parameters necessary for ECIES encryption/decryption This class is designed to be fairly neutral so that it can be replaced by a Java-native GcmParameterSpec if one appears. It is based off of what RSA has implemented in bsafe share An instance of this class is immutable.

Constructor Detail

LunaECIESParameterSpec

public LunaECIESParameterSpec(LunaECIESParameterSpec.DH_PRIMITIVE dhPrimitive,
                              LunaECIESParameterSpec.KDF kdf,
                              LunaECIESParameterSpec.HMAC hmacScheme,
                              byte[] sharedData1,
                              byte[] sharedData2)
Sets the spec data

Parameters:
dhPrimitive - The DH Primitive, either ECDH or ECDHC
kdf - The KDF to use. SHA1, SHA224, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512
hmacScheme - The HMAC to use. hmacSHA1, HmacSha224, HmacSHA256, HmacSHA384, HmacSHA512
sharedData1 - Bytes to use in conjunction with the dhPrimitive
sharedData2 - Bytes to use in conjunction with the HMAC operation

LunaECIESParameterSpec

public LunaECIESParameterSpec(LunaECIESParameterSpec.DH_PRIMITIVE dhPrimitive,
                              LunaECIESParameterSpec.KDF kdf,
                              LunaECIESParameterSpec.HMAC hmacScheme,
                              LunaECIESParameterSpec.ENCRYPTION_SCHEME encScheme,
                              int encKeyLen,
                              int macKeyLen,
                              int macLen,
                              byte[] sharedData1,
                              byte[] sharedData2)
Sets the spec data

Parameters:
dhPrimitive - The DH Primitive, either ECDH or ECDHC
kdf - The KDF to use. SHA1, SHA224, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512
hmacScheme - The HMAC to use. hmacSHA1, HmacSha224, HmacSHA256, HmacSHA384, HmacSHA512
encScheme - The encryption scheme to use. XOR, AES_CBC_PAD, AES_CBC, DESede_CBC_PAD, DESede_CBC
encKeyLen - The length of the encryption key
macKeyLen - The length of the MAC key
macLen - The length of the MAC
sharedData1 - Bytes to use in conjunction with the dhPrimitive
sharedData2 - Bytes to use in conjunction with the HMAC operation
